title: ESS权限问题
author: a1263513189
txt_content: 怎么禁止玩家使用/bukkit：me 这个指令

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: Stant_hed
replies.txt_content: 禁止me权限即可。/mangdelp builder essentials.me 记得采纳
